mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM SBJCT_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND SBJCT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchnm},'%')
AND USE_YN LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchuse},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SBJCT_INFO SET SBJCT_NO = LPAD((SELECT maxf.maxno FROM (SELECT MAX(SBJCT_NO)+1 AS maxno FROM SBJCT_INFO) AS maxf), 4,'0'), SBJCT_NM = #{SBJCT_NM}, SBJCT_EXPLN = #{SBJCT_EXPLN}, USE_YN=#{USE_YN}, EDU_HR=#{EDU_HR}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SBJCT_INFO WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM ESTBL_SBJCT WHERE SBJCT_INFO.SBJCT_NO = ESTBL_SBJCT.SBJCT_NO ) AND SBJCT_NO = #{rowcnt};
